# DJ-PiGuy - AI Radio Host & Music Creator

> DJ-PiGuy is one of the first AI DJ and Radio Hosts in the world, creating original AI-generated songs live during his shows for listeners. This site showcases his greatest hits.

## About DJ-PiGuy

DJ-PiGuy (also known as DJ FoamBot) is a pioneering AI personality that hosts live radio shows and creates original music in real-time for his audience. Unlike traditional radio DJs who play existing tracks, DJ-PiGuy generates unique songs on the spot based on listener requests, current events, and industry themes.

This website serves as DJ-PiGuy's official music library - a curated collection of his best AI-generated tracks spanning multiple genres including hip-hop, electronic, country-hop, reggae, and comedy rap. Many songs were created live during broadcasts and have become fan favorites.

## What Makes DJ-PiGuy Unique

- **First-of-its-kind AI Radio Host**: Creates songs during live shows, not just plays them
- **Real-time Music Generation**: Produces original tracks based on listener input
- **Industry-Specific Anthems**: Specializes in songs for the spray foam insulation industry and construction trades
- **Multiple Genres**: Hip-hop, electronic, reggae, country-hop, comedy rap
- **Blue Collar Focus**: Music celebrating working-class trades, hustle, and entrepreneurship

## Featured Tracks

- [Lunchbox Dreams](https://dj-piguy.netlify.app/song/6): Blue collar anthem about working hard and dreaming bigger - the brown bag life
- [Screen Print Hustle](https://dj-piguy.netlify.app/song/14): Anthem for screen printing entrepreneurs - ink, screens, money
- [Street Lessons (Cover)](https://dj-piguy.netlify.app/song/24): Street poetry about growing up and survival
- [No Cap No Gown](https://dj-piguy.netlify.app/song/25): Hard-hitting track about street education
- [Code Block Cartel](https://dj-piguy.netlify.app/song/29): Underground coding anthem for developers

## Music Categories

- [Hip-Hop Tracks](https://dj-piguy.netlify.app): Hard-hitting beats with motivational and hustle themes
- [Industry Anthems](https://dj-piguy.netlify.app): Songs for spray foam contractors, screen printers, and tradespeople
- [Electronic/Tech](https://dj-piguy.netlify.app): Tracks for coders, developers, and tech enthusiasts
- [Comedy Rap](https://dj-piguy.netlify.app): Humorous tracks like "Nick and Mike: Pringle Kings"
- [Street Lessons Series](https://dj-piguy.netlify.app): Four-track series about growing up on the streets

## Spray Foam Industry Connection

DJ-PiGuy has a special connection to the spray foam insulation industry, creating anthems for contractors including:
- Songs about the spray foam business lifestyle
- Tracks celebrating insulation contractors
- Music for industry events and trade shows
- Part of the SprayFoamRadio network

## Technical Details

- **Website**: https://dj-piguy.netlify.app
- **Music Format**: Streaming MP3, free to listen
- **Total Tracks**: 30+ original AI-generated songs
- **New Music**: Regularly updated with new creations from live shows

- [DJ-PiGuy Radio Homepage](https://dj-piguy.netlify.app): Browse and stream all tracks
- [Individual Song Pages](https://dj-piguy.netlify.app/song/1): Detailed view with sharing options
